title: Pep pleased with Sheikh meet
text:
Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola pleased with Sheikh Mansour meeting By PA Sport   4:19pm Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola has met the club's owner Sheikh Mansour Pep Guardiola said he was pleased with his first meeting with Manchester City owner Sheikh Mansour but is well aware he needs to deliver some silverware. 
City took advantage of a free weekend to travel to Abu Dhabi for a warm-weather training camp last week and spent time with the club's hierarchy during the trip. Bournemouth 0-2 Man City 
It was the first time Guardiola had met with the sheikh, whose funds have transformed City in the past nine years, since the Spaniard's arrival at the Etihad Stadium last summer. 
"With [chairman] Khaldoon [Al Mubarak] we speak regularly - the last period he came often here - but the other people we met for the first time, [including] Sheikh Mansour," said Guardiola. 
"I was really impressed that he knew absolutely everything about us. It was nice to meet him and spend a few hours together. S'land vs Man City
